transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good morning sir.
Customer: Ji madam.
Executive: Hello IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu aapke account manager Silver Cast and Alloys se baat ho rahi hai meri right?
Customer: Ha ha ho rahi hai.
Executive: Ha sir aapne call kiya tha aapne newly join kiye hai services right?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: IndiaMART ke to aapne call kiya tha matlab ki kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: First call kiya tha maine.
Executive: Aapne jo call kiya hai 10 tarikh mein call kiya hai aapne 1:15 minute 20 seconds pe.
Customer: Shreya Shukla.
Executive: Ha sir. Accha 11 ho gayi to kal ka issue hoga koi aaj pata nahi mere ko.
Executive: Okay to sir aapki jo services hai aapka jo account hai mujhe assign kiya gaya hai theek hai. To abse aapka jo account rahega main hi monitor karungi. To aap please mera number save kar lijiyega and WhatsApp number bhi mera yahi rahega. To aapki services to active ho gayi hai but aapne buyleads vagera nahi consume kiye hai. Pan India deal karte hai ya kaise?
Customer: Hum 11 baje ke baad buyleads aayega to check karenge. To usi hisab se aapko bhejna ya tab call karna to update mil jayegi aapko. Aapka naam kya hai?
Executive: Shesna.
Customer: Okay. To aap WhatsApp pe hi karke bhej do yahi number hai mera bhi. To buyleads abhi main office pe jaake check karunga.
Executive: Theek hai aap ye pure India mein hi deal karte hai na?
Customer: Ha ha pure India mein deal karte hai.
Executive: Pan India mein deal karte hai theek hai aapke pass vaise to buyleads aa rahi hai SS 316 plate cutting scrap thickness 10 mm 10 ton ki inko requirement hai.
Customer: Ha wo 3 mm ka perfect nahi hai kisi bhi unki requirement milegi. Usme mix hai.
Executive: Ha usme mix hai to isme nahi karte deal se?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Aap aapko pata hai kahan se aapko buyleads consume karni hai kahan se aapko buyer se baat karni hai?
Customer: Ha buyer se baat karne mein to wo kuch subscription ka aa raha tha beech mein to Shreya mam se baat hui thi usme kaha tha ki wo nikal jayega. Contact to buyer now aisa jo call ke liye option aata hai na waha pe click karne se hi.
Executive: Nahi aapko na see dekhiye abhi na aapne subscription liya hai one year ka theek hai. Abhi isme kya rehta hai buyleads aati hai buyleads ko aapko consume karna hota hai. Fir unpe aapko message karna hota hai fir call karna hota hai. To aap abhi newly join hue hai to abhi aap kuch samay ke baad video meet pe join ho sakte hai?
Customer: Ha sir ho sakte hai.
Executive: Video meeting pe kab tak aap free rahenge aap mujhe bataiye?
Customer: Afternoon ke time mein rehte hai madam.
Executive: Matlab ki 11 baje ke baad?
Customer: Nahi 1 baje ke baad.
Executive: 1 baje ke baad theek hai to 1 baje ke baad aap free rahenge to aap please laptop pe join honge ya phone se join honge?
Customer: Dono taraf ho sakte hai aur mostly aap call shuru rakhna aapki meeting aap screen pe dikhana share screen karna apni usme se hi bata dena kis tarah trade karna hai.
Executive: Aapka yahi WhatsApp number hai kya?
Customer: Ha yahi hai.
Executive: Ek minute rukiyega. Ek baar aap bol sakte hai WhatsApp number apna please boliye. 966
Customer: 966
Customer: 49
Executive: 96649
Customer: 71688
Executive: 71688
Executive: Ek minute rukiyega 9664971688 right?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ha ek baar aap check kariye maine aapko text kiya hai hi ka dekhiye aaya?
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Ha yahi mera number rahega aur yahi mera WhatsApp number bhi hai theek hai. Aap call karega fir main aapse aapko sari cheeze bata deti hu kyuki aapko buylead aur inquiry ye sari cheeze aapko aaj hi karni hongi tabhi aapki services aage active show hongi. Theek hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To please aap 1 baje karenge na?
Customer: 1 baje ke aas pass kar lunga aapse message karunga aapko uske baad rakhta hu.
Executive: Kab 1 baje na?
Customer: Ha 1 baje.
Executive: Ha 1 baje tak free rahega kyuki main yaha se line up kar dungi teen mere manager rahenge wo bhi add ho jayenge theek hai. Baki aapne jo bhi services li thi aapne khud li thi ya samne se inhone batai thi Shreya ji ne batai thi aapko right?
Customer: Ha usme mujhe help ki thi sari cheeze jannene aur bola tha kis tarah kam milta karte hai isme IndiaMART mein kam kaise kaise aapko use kiya jata hai.
Executive: Accha aur services aapko kisne di thi ye one year ki?
Customer: Ye Shreya mam ne batai thi nahi to maine apne aap se purchase ki thi.
Executive: Accha Shreya mam ne hi batai thi fir aapne aapne khud hi purchase kar li right?
Customer: Ha. Main unko unke through hi kiye hai matlab.
Executive: Unke through kiye to kya kya aapko bataya gaya tha ki services mein kya kya aapko milega?
Customer: Usme to jo info mein likha hua hai jo one year package mein ye normal wala jo first package hai 31000 wala wahi to 17 by lead aati hai daily ki one bonus mein aur is tarah ki 10 by lead weekly aur daily ki one bonus mein is tarah ki.
Executive: Ha wo har roz aapki expire bhi ho jati hai jo bonus mein aate hai na har roz one one buylead aate hai wo expire bhi ho jate hai raat mein 11:59 par theek hai aur jo Saturday mein jo milti hai aapko wo next week aapki Sunday mein expire ho jate hai 11:59 pe. To aapko ye use karni rehte hai aur kya bataya tha ki business aapko kaise milega karke?
Customer: Wo to isi tarah usne to kaha buyleads ke through business milega aur ek yaha ka local area ka koi manager wo denge wo aayenge check karne ke liye wo thode customer denge wo abhi tak koi aaya nahi hai fir usne bola tha ki aapke liye aayenge aayenge wo bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Local area ka nahi aate hai ye account assign kiya jata hai account manager ko. To main hi aapki account manager rahungi theek hai ye account mujhe assign kiya gaya hai theek hai. To jo bhi problem rahegi services vagera wo sari cheeze main hi dekhungi.
Customer: Theek hai magar aap ek baar baat kar lo kyuki usne bola tha ki yaha se koi assign nahi hoga waha ka local area ka hi koi manager aapko assign kar denge aapko jo nearby jo bhi hai chahiye.
Executive: Wo physically nahi aayega koi bhi main aapko clearly abhi bata deti hu agar aapko ye sari cheeze batai gayi thi to main aapko pehle hi bata deti hu ki aapke ghar.
Customer: To iska matlab ye hua ki aapke jo IndiaMART ke log hai wo jhoot bol rahe hai.
Executive: Sorry wo services ke time aate hai jab aapki upgradation hoti hai uske baad jo aapki one year tak jo services provide ki jati hai wo virtual account manager ke through ki jati hai. Jaise ki main ho gayi ya koi aur ho gayi aapke pass ye mera number rahega aapko kabhi bhi koi bhi problem hoti hai just aapko call karna rahega. But physically meetup allow nahi hai matlab ki koi aapke pass aayega nearby location ka ya aisa kuch wo possible nahi hai isme. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai koi nahi chalo main unse pehle main unse pehle baat karta hu kyuki main zyada tar to unhi mere touch mein rahi ab tak aur unhone hi bataya ki kis tarah kaun sa plan purchase karna hai aur kya kya aapko IndiaMART ki or se milega. To unse baat karke fir aapko kehta hu.
Executive: Aur kya kya bola tha unhone kya kya milega karke?
Customer: Yaar aap ek hi team mein ho to aap unse puch lo kya kya bola tha sab mujhse puch kar kya.
Executive: Ab wo sales team hoti hai ye hamari services team hoti hai. To isliye hum aapse confirmation lete hai agar aapko koi mislead na kiya gaya ho isiliye main puch rahi hu aapse.
Customer: Mislead to usne mere sath dedh ghanta baat ki hai meeting par usne bahut sari cheez batai aabhi mujhe bhi yaad nahi. Aisa usne hi bataya tha ki yaha ka nearby ka koi aayega wo aapko normally aas pass ka bhi kuch kam hoga jaise Bhavnagar mein abhi bahut log scrap ka kam karte hai to aapko milega waha se unke pass se zyada tar update wahi denge.
Executive: Dekhiye nearby ka jo bhi buyer rahega na wo to aapko jaise ki wo IndiaMART pe request post karega wo to milega jaise ki aap Bhavnagar se hai. Theek hai agar main Bhavnagar ka aapka filter lagati hu to Bhavnagar Gujarat se 16 ghante pehle hi buylead aayi hai SS 316 plate cutting scrap thickness 10 mm ki ye to 4 saal purane buyer hai hamare sath jude hue hai.
Customer: Theek hai koi nahi.
Executive: Koi nahi aage ki baat baad mein karte hai main bhi mam abhi office pe aaya hu to fir 1 baje baat kar lenge.
Executive: Theek hai to 1 baje aap free rahiyega theek hai? Main aapko fir baat karti hu okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know about buyleads.

- Customer was told a local manager would visit.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to consume buyleads.

- Executive clarified no physical visits, virtual support only.

- Executive offered a video meeting at 1 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect at 1 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, account manager, services
